titleInfo.title: 'Second Memorandum on the Lighting and Buoyage of the Persian Gulf'

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: the file is contained within a bound volume that contains several other reports on a number of topics.Description: The foliation sequence commences at the first folio and terminates at a loose plastic sheet containing the binding; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file is a memorandum written by John Edward Ferard of the India Office's Political Department regarding the development and improvement of lighting and buoyage facilities in the Persian Gulf (including the installation of lighthouses, lighted buoys and dioptric lanterns).The memorandum is a continuation of a earlier memorandum that was produced on 28 December 1911 (IOR/L/PS/18/B187) and provides an update of developments that had taken place since the previous memorandum was written.
